_sText:
Hostage rescue map, part of my reconstruction project. Reduced version of my recent map cs_ uvalno _villa
Updates:
  • Few of my custom props 
  • Instead of backyard I made cellar, which may change gameplay.
  • Reduction of map size increased framerate a bit.

10th August 2011 BUG FIX UPDATE 

Skeeper found bug: "in the kitchen, at the second window we can go outside the map and explore the skybox" 
If you have older version of map (before this date) please re-download map again to guarantee version compatibility

30th April 2015 NAV-FILE UPDATE

Meurglis3 made great work on brand new tuned Bot's Navigation Mesh! Don't fotget update NAV-FILE for the best experiences even with CPU friends Hand-tuned NAV for map CS_UVALNO_VILLA_PRO 

If you like this one, check all of my maps here
This map or its parts is also used in my singleplayer mod

Have a fun
Dinus Saurus
